net.proteusframework.email

Class EmailTemplateDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.DAOHelper
      • net.proteusframework.email.EmailTemplateDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InitializingBean

    @Repository(value="EmailTemplateDAO")
public class EmailTemplateDAO
extends net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.dao.DAOHelper
    Data access object for EmailTemplate.
    Author:
    Jonathan Crosmer (jcrosmer@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • clearConfiguration

        public void clearConfiguration(EmailTemplate emailTemplate)
                        throws HibernateException
        Removes the configuration object from the database if it is stored there and sets the template's configuration field to null.
        Parameters:
        emailTemplate - the source of the EmailConfig
        Throws:
        HibernateException - if database access fails

      • deleteConfiguration

        public void deleteConfiguration(EmailConfig emailConfig)
                         throws HibernateException
        Deletes an EmailConfig from the database, if it is an entity. (Otherwise does nothing, avoiding special cases when this method is called.)
        Parameters:
        emailConfig - the object to delete
        Throws:
        HibernateException - if database access fails

      • getEmailConfigType

        public <EC extends EmailConfig> EmailConfigType<EC> getEmailConfigType(EC emailConfig)

        Type Parameters:
        EC - the email configuration type.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the EmailConfigType.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a type could not be found.

      • getEmailConfigTypeByConfiguration

        public <EC extends EmailConfig> EmailConfigType<EC> getEmailConfigTypeByConfiguration(Class<EC> emailConfigClass)
        Get the EmailConfigType that can create the specified configuration class. This should only be called if there is a 1-1 correspondence between EmailConfig and EmailConfigType implementations.
        Type Parameters:
        EC - the email configuration type.
        Parameters:
        emailConfigClass - the email configuration class.
        Returns:
        the EmailConfigType.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a type could not be found.

      • getEmailConfigTypeByType

        public <EC extends EmailConfig,ECT extends EmailConfigType<EC>> ECT getEmailConfigTypeByType(Class<ECT> emailConfigTypeClass)
        Get the EmailConfigType by class. This should only be called if the type is used as a singleton.
        Type Parameters:
        EC - the email configuration.
        ECT - the email configuration type.
        Parameters:
        emailConfigTypeClass - the email configuration type class.
        Returns:
        the EmailConfigType.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a type could not be found.

      • getEmailConfigTypes

        public List<? extends EmailConfigType<?>> getEmailConfigTypes(@Nullable
                                                              net.proteusframework.internet.http.Site site)
        Get the email configuration types available.
        Parameters:
        site - the site. If null, any site specific EmailConfigTypes are skipped.
        Returns:
        the list of email configuration types.

      • getEmailTemplate

        public EmailTemplate getEmailTemplate(long id)
        Gets an email template by id.
        Parameters:
        id - database id
        Returns:
        EmailTemplate or null if none found for that id

      • getEmailTemplate

        public EmailTemplate getEmailTemplate(String programmaticName,
                                      CmsSite site)
                               throws HibernateException
        Get an EmailTemplate by programmatic name and site, which together uniquely identify an EmailTemplate.
        Parameters:
        programmaticName - to use in the query
        site - to use in the query
        Returns:
        the EmailTemplate, or null if no template matches the arguments
        Throws:
        HibernateException - if database access fails

      • getEmailTemplates

        public List<EmailTemplate> getEmailTemplates(com.i2rd.emailmanagement.EmailTemplateSearchConstraint first,
                                             com.i2rd.emailmanagement.EmailTemplateSearchConstraint... others)
        Gets email templates using the given constraints. This creates an HQLBuilder to pass to the constraints. The HQLBuilder will be rooted on EmailTemplate with alias 'et'.
        Parameters:
        first - the first constraint (at least one is required)
        others - more constraints (may be no more); all constraints are used as a conjunction
        Returns:
        the templates

      • getImplementationModelFactory

        com.i2rd.implementationmodel.IImplementationModelFactory<EmailConfigType<?>,EmailConfig> getImplementationModelFactory()
        Get the implementation model factory for retrieving EmailConfigTypes.
        Returns:
        the factory.

      • getQLSupplier

        public Supplier<net.proteusframework.ui.search.QLBuilder> getQLSupplier(net.proteusframework.ui.search.SearchConstraint... constraints)
        Get a QLBuilder supplier.
        Parameters:
        constraints - optional constraints to be ANDed together. The constraints will not be supplied without a Component.

        In the future a alternate interface will be factored out that will maintain API compability.

        Returns:
        the supplier.

      • getTemplatesForSite

        public List<EmailTemplate> getTemplatesForSite(CmsSite site)
                                        throws HibernateException
        Get a list of non-deleted templates available for a given site. List will be in descending order by id.
        Parameters:
        site - the site to use in the query or null
        Returns:
        a list of EmailTemplates for the given site, or the empty list if site is null
        Throws:
        HibernateException - if database access fails

        Make a search constraint that limits to a particular site.
        Parameters:
        site - the site to limit the results
        Returns:
        a new constraint

      • save

        public void save(EmailTemplate entity)
          throws CmsValidationException,
                 HibernateException
        Persist an EmailTemplate. Validates the programmatic name first.
        Parameters:
        entity - the template to save
        Throws:
        CmsValidationException - if validation fails or a ConstraintViolationException is caught during persistence
        HibernateException - if persistence fails for reason other than ConstraintViolationException

      • softDeleteEmailTemplates

        public void softDeleteEmailTemplates(List<EmailTemplate> templates,
                                     boolean deleteEmailConfigs)
        Soft delete the specified email templates.
        Parameters:

        deleteEmailConfigs - delete email configurations.

      • validateProgrammaticName

        @Nullable
public net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedObjectKey validateProgrammaticName(String programmaticName,
                                                                                              CmsSite site,
                                                                                              long emailTemplateId)
        Validates data for an EmailTemplate. Checks that programmaticName is null or unique for the given site; if the programmatic name is already used for the current site in the database, it is valid as long as the EmailTemplate in the database has the given id.
        Parameters:
        programmaticName - the programmatic name to validate with site
        site - a Site
        emailTemplateId - the id that will be counted as "valid" if the database already has a template for the given programmatic name and site
        Returns:
        null if name is valid, otherwise a message describing the problem
